channel.title: How to bypass Ip-Ban/Change IRC Nick
channel.description:
Hello Taharok, I assume that you will be the first one to act out again. You probably remember me, the Ryan's Client guy who got banned and kept coming back saying fuck you. Well FUCK YOU! Anyway here is the Tut.
1st. Changing your IRC Nick to a mods; why FAG banned me. You should see your username in the address bar [IMG]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/RyanR0x/rr.jpg[/img] Highlight it and then change it to whatever and reload the page. [IMG]http://i296.photobucket.com/albums/mm187/RyanR0x/rd.jpg[/img] (Make sure you substitute spaces with under scores (_))
2nd. Getting Un-IP banned from the MoparScape Forums. This is very simple. Clear any history of any MoparScape website, and then go back to the forums. You cannot log onto the banned account or it will re-ban you. FUCK YOU MOPARSCAPE! I HOPE YOU AND TAHAROK ROUGHT IN HELL!

item.title: How to bypass Ip-Ban/Change IRC Nick
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Lol. New forum software, and an idiot. Play time.

Read full topic
item.source: How to bypass Ip-Ban/Change IRC Nick

item.title: How to bypass Ip-Ban/Change IRC Nick
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If you had a lick of sense in your whole body, you would realize that on all IRC clients, you can change your nickname by typing:

/nick newnick

Wow.

Read full topic
item.source: How to bypass Ip-Ban/Change IRC Nick
